text: is a 2023 Japanese thriller film written and directed by Akihiro Toda and starring Hana Sugisaki, Ryuya Wakaba, Yūki Morinaga, Daichi Watanabe, Shōhei Uno, Yuri Nakamura. It was released on 8 December 2023. == Cast == * Hana Sugisaki * Ryuya Wakaba * Yūki Morinaga * Daichi Watanabe * Shōhei Uno * Yuri Nakamura == Production == The film was announced in July 2023. The trailer of the film was released on 1 September 2023. == Release == The film was screened at the 28th Busan International Film Festival, 36th Tokyo International Film Festival, Gothenburg Film Festival, Far East Film Festival, Japanese Film Festival and New York Asian Film Festival. The film premiered on Amazon Prime Video on 27 February 2024. == Reception == Mark Schilling of The Japan Times rated the film 4 stars out of 5. Subhash K. Jha of Times Now reviewed the film. === Accolades === Date Award Category Recipients Result 2024 78th Mainichi Film Awards Best Actress Hana Sugisaki 2024 47th Japan Academy Film Prize Best Actress Hana Sugisaki 2024 Takasaki Film Festival Best Supporting Actor Yuri Nakamura 2024 Takasaki Film Festival Best Supervisor Award Akihiro Toda == References == == Other websites == *
title: Ichiko (movie)
